text: Kasugayama Primeval Forest is a primeval forest in the eastern part of Nara City, Nara Prefecture. It is 250 hectares large. It is the Chinju no Mori of Kasuga-taisha so nobody was allowed to hunt or log there since 841.『ふるさとの文化遺産 郷土資料事典29 奈良県』人文社、1997年10月1日。p.48 It is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site "Historic Monuments of Ancient Nara".春日山原始林 - 奈良公園管理事務所（2013年8月25日閲覧）春日山原始林 - 奈良公園 Quick Guide（2013年8月25日閲覧） The site is in the northern temperate zone but it has many southern species that prosper there. It has a wide variety of species. It is especially unique due to being so close to a city == Related pages == * Chinju no Mori == References == == Other websites == * Nara Park Guide (viewed April 2013, 4) * Conservation ecological study of World Heritage Kasugayama Primeval Forest and natural monument Sika deer (accessed April 25, 2013) * Kasugayama Primeval Forest | Kasugano Nara Tourism (viewed April 25, 2013) Category:Nara Prefecture Category:Forests
title: Kasugayama Primeval Forest
